body_html: @zandaqo You only need standalone MSVC compiler with Windows 10 SDK and CMake, so there is no need to install the whole Visual Studio. Windows 10 SDK contains dll, static libraries, header files and source codes for the libraries and some useful tools, but it does not contain compiler.
body_text: @zandaqo You only need standalone MSVC compiler with Windows 10 SDK and CMake, so there is no need to install the whole Visual Studio. Windows 10 SDK contains dll, static libraries, header files and source codes for the libraries and some useful tools, but it does not contain compiler.
body: @zandaqo You only need [standalone MSVC compiler with Windows 10 SDK](https://landinghub.visualstudio.com/visual-cpp-build-tools) and CMake, so there is no need to install the whole Visual Studio. Windows 10 SDK contains dll, static libraries, header files and source codes for the libraries and some useful tools, but it does not contain compiler.
